document_data.name: Skull Cup
document_data.mainbody: The '''Skull Cup''' was an inn located in the northwestern [[Ring Caverns (Oryndoll)|Ring Caverns]] of [[Oryndoll]]. The inn catered to non-[[illithid]]s. Drinks were served in goblets that were shaped from the skulls of [[human]]s, [[demihuman]]s, and other [[humanoid]]s. The safety of guests was not guaranteed and the patrons were also watched at all times by vigileators (security officials) and their agents.
